author: Diario La Tribuna
title: Acusan al Estado salvadoreño de mantener bajo “secuestro” a exministro de Seguridad
text: Acusan al Estado salvadoreño de mantener bajo “secuestro” a exministro de Seguridad El Comité de Familiares de Presas y Presos Políticos de El Salvador (Cofappes) acusó el jueves al Estado salvadoreño de mantener bajo “secuestro” a Mauricio Ramírez Landaverde, exministro de Seguridad, y Ramón Roque, exinspector general de Centros Penales, quienes se mantienen en prisión a pesar de una orden judicial de liberación. Ivania Cruz, abogada de Cofappes, dijo a periodistas que las autoridades se han negado a cumplir la orden que les permite seguir un proceso penal en libertad, una situación que tildó de “un secuestro de parte del Estado salvadoreño a estas personas”. Agregó que los detenidos no tienen comunicación con sus familiares y que tampoco sus abogados defensores han podido tener contacto con ellos. Cruz manifestó que han recibido cartas de organizaciones humanitarias y “aliados internacionales”, que también denuncian que “es injusto que hace más de dos semanas se haya ordenado la libertad y que a la fecha no se haya dado cumplimiento”. “Tenemos incluso apoyos internacionales donde ya se ha dado a conocer la resolución de libertad de Mauricio Ramírez y Ramón Roque, que hasta la fecha está secuestrado por el Gobierno de El Salvador”, añadió. Señaló directamente al director general de Centros Penales, Osiris Luna, y a la dirección de la cárcel La Esperanza, una instalación ubicada cerca de la capital, de negarse a cumplir la resolución dictada por la corte que realizará un juicio por el supuesto manejo irregular de recursos en las prisiones. Cofappes pidió el pasado 21 de diciembre a la Fiscalía investigar la negativa de las autoridades de las prisiones, con lo que se estaría cometiendo los delitos de desacato judicial, privación de libertad y actos arbitrarios. La detención del exministro se dio en septiembre de 2021 y la Fiscalía lo acusa de supuestamente estar involucrado en la malversación de aproximadamente 14 millones de dólares de las prisiones durante la administración de Salvador Sánchez Cerén (2014-2019). Tras la captura, el fiscal general, Rodolfo Delgado, dijo que el Ejecutivo de Sánchez Cerén permitió que la organización Asocambio administrara las tiendas al interior de las cárceles “sin ningún control del Estado”, lo que “dio pie para crear un mecanismo para poder lucrarse”. Ramírez Landaverde fue nombrado ministro de Justicia en enero de 2016. Antes se había desempeñado como director general de la Policía Nacional Civil de 2014 a 2016 y como subdirector de esa entidad entre 2012 a 2014. EFE

author: eduardo.reyes
title: ¿Para qué sirve el jabón de avena? Así puedes hacerlo en tu casa
text:
¿Para qué sirve el jabón de avena? Es una de las preguntas que muchas personas se hacen cuando buscan opciones para el cuidado de su piel. Este producto no es nada nuevo, pero sí cada vez más valorado y utilizado. Su popularidad no responde a una moda pasajera, sino a una combinación efectiva de propiedades que limpian, calman e hidratan sin causar daño.
Descubre todos sus increíbles beneficios y usos que le puedes dar, es un jabón muy diferente a los demás, lo vas a querer usar siempre.
¿Para qué se utiliza el jabón de avena?
Lo primero que hay que saber sobre este producto es que no es un jabón cualquiera, está hecho para limpiar y proteger pieles sensibles o con tendencia a irritarse. La avena, al entrar en contacto con el agua y la piel, libera compuestos que ayudan a mantener el equilibrio natural de humedad.
Lo anterior evita que la piel se reseque, además actúa como una especie de barrera que protege sin dejar la sensación grasosa de otros jabones o cremas corporales.
Una de las principales funciones del jabón de avena es limpiar sin lastimar, a diferencia de otros jabones convencionales que eliminan los aceites naturales de la piel, el de avena limpia sin despojarla de estos aceites que la piel necesita.
Por eso es muy útil en personas con piel seca, dermatitis o incluso acné, ya que la avena tiene efectos calmantes y antiinflamatorios. Además, su textura ligeramente granulada permite una exfoliación suave que elimina células muertas sin causar irritación.
Otro punto a destacar es su capacidad para reducir comezón o enrojecimiento. Muchos dermatólogos lo suelen recomendar como parte de rutinas para pieles atópicas o con alergias.
La avena contiene compuestos que ayudan a calmar la inflamación de forma natural, también ayuda a equilibrar el pH, algo clave para que la piel esté en buen estado, y tiene un efecto que mejora la elasticidad y la apariencia general.
Incluso en pieles normales, el jabón de avena se puede usar diario, con el tiempo y uso continuo puede hacer que la piel luzca más pareja y saludable. Aporta una sensación de limpieza sin resecar y deja un acabado suave que se nota desde las primeras aplicaciones.
¿Cómo hacer jabón de avena?
Hacer un jabón de avena es mucho más fácil y sencillo de lo que se cree, tan solo necesitas lo siguiente.
Ingredientes:
- 500g de base de jabón de glicerina transparente
- 6 cucharadas de avena molida
- 2 cucharadas de aceite de coco
- 1 cucharada de miel de abeja
- 10 gotas de aceite esencial de lavanda
- 1 molde de silicón para jabón
- Alcohol en spray
Preparación:
- Comienza por cortar la glicerina en cubos pequeños para que se derrita más fácil.
- Posteriormente, colócala a baño María o en el microondas en intervalos de 30 segundos, removiendo entre cada uno, para que se derrita por completo.
- Cuando esté lista, agrega la avena molida y mezcla hasta que no haya grumos.
- Incorpora el aceite de coco y mezcla hasta que esté completamente integrado.
- Posteriormente, añade la miel, el aceite esencial y mezcla para integrar todo y el aroma sea parejo en todo el jabón.
- Vierte la mezcla en los moldes, rocía un poco de alcohol en la superficie para eliminar las burbujas de aire que hayan quedado atrapadas.
- Deja enfriar a temperatura ambiente hasta que el jabón esté sólido.
- Desmolda y utiliza.
Ahora ya sabes para qué sirve el jabón de avena y cómo puedes hacerlo en la comodidad de tu hogar, una vez que lo utilices, no lo querrás dejar nunca.

author: Dmytro
title: Почти 600 гривен за килограмм: в Украине взлетела цена на популярный продукт
text:
За последний месяц в Украине наблюдалась смешанная динамика цен на молочные продукты. Согласно данным Ассоциации производителей молока, некоторые товары подешевели, в то время как большинство других продуктов подорожало.
"За последний месяц в Украине подешевели пастеризованное молоко жирностью до 2,6% в пленке, кефир жирностью 2,5% в тетрапаке и стекле, творог жирностью 9% и сыр "Сулугуни". Цены на другие молочные продукты потребительской корзины либо остались без изменений, либо в среднем подорожали на 2,9%", – сообщил аналитик АПМ Георгий Кухалейшвили.
Пастеризованное молоко жирностью до 2,6% в пленке в июне стоило в среднем 45,65 грн за килограмм, что на 75 копеек меньше по сравнению с маем. В то же время тот же продукт в пластиковой бутылке подорожал до 63,81 грн за килограмм. Кефир жирностью 2,5% в пленке, наоборот, подорожал на 37 копеек до 55,54 грн за килограмм.
Среди продуктов, которые значительно подорожали, выделяется сметана жирностью 15% в стаканах, средняя цена которой выросла до 191,13 грн за килограмм. Питьевой йогурт жирностью от 1,6% до 2,8% в пластиковых бутылках стоит в среднем 116,44 грн за килограмм.
Больше всего подорожало сливочное масло отечественного производства, средняя цена которого достигла 584,82 грн за килограмм, что на 11,18 грн больше по сравнению с предыдущим месяцем. По словам Кухалейшвили, масло дорожает из-за высоких мировых цен на биржевые товары. В частности, цена на масло в Европейском Союзе в мае держалась на уровне 7200-7400 евро за тонну, что является почти рекордными показателями с 2017-2018 годов.
Твердых сыров также коснулось подорожание. Сыр "Голландский" жирностью 45% стоит в среднем 590,64 грн за килограмм, а "Гауда" жирностью 45% от украинских компаний - 593,14 грн за килограмм.
В Ассоциации производителей молока обращают внимание на растущее влияние импорта на внутренний рынок. "Увеличение предложения и потребления импортных сыров на внутреннем рынке мешает реализации продукции отечественных сыроваров. Доля импортных сыров на внутреннем рынке достигла 47%", – отметили в организации.
Эксперты прогнозируют возможное снижение цен на молочную продукцию из-за отмены Европейским Союзом автономных торговых мер для украинской молочной продукции, которые действовали с 2022 года.
"Если не удастся договориться с Еврокомиссией об увеличении квот на молочную продукцию или об их отмене и сохранении беспошлинного режима, тогда вероятно сокращение Украиной объемов экспорта биржевых товаров, а увеличение излишков молока-сырья и нереализованных продуктов должно давить на внутренние цены", – предупреждают в отраслевой ассоциации.
Также напомним, где дешевле купить масло, хлеб и молоко.

author: Damon Matson
title: Weather Forecast | Washington, DC
text: Happy New Year everyone! We ended 2023 on a quiet note, but 2024 will begin a little unsettled. A weak low pressure center is crossing the area, producing plenty of clouds and light precipitation. Some rain has already fallen in and around the DC metro early this morning, with snow showers coming down across the mountains. There will be a small break in the precipitation this morning as this disturbance moves east of the area before another round of light rain/snow showers develops in the afternoon. Temperatures will remain just warm enough in the lower elevations and to the east (closer to DC) for only rain to fall. Once you head west or up in elevation, precipitation will likely fall as wet snow. Across far western MD and WV, there could be a fresh 1-3″ of snow on the ground by tonight. All of this precipitation ends after sunset, with clouds slowly clearing out. The middle of the week is looking pleasant as high pressure returns. Some clouds will hang around, but there should be plenty of sunshine otherwise on Tuesday and Wednesday. Temperatures will remain seasonal during this time, with highs in the 40s and lows around the freezing mark. Another weak disturbance will drop down out of the north on Thursday, phasing together with another weak disturbance closer to the coast. With limited moisture around, only clouds and a few spotty rain showers are expected east of the mountains, with some light snow for the higher terrain. Abundant sunshine will return on Friday as a strong area of high pressure pushes back into the region. This sounds good, but the colder air this ridge brings ahead of an approaching storm system will make for a messy setup on Saturday and Sunday. It’s still too far out to pinpoint how cold temperatures could get, the exact track of this approaching storm, or how intense any precipitation will be once the storm arrives. These finer details will all play a huge role in exactly what impacts we see across the area from this storm. We will be tracking this setup closely over the coming days, but for now, expect a messy Saturday into Saturday night, with a rain/snow mix falling, at the very least. This storm will begin to pull away next Sunday, with winds kicking up on the backside of this system to end the weekend. Have a great start to the new year! 7-Day Forecast: Today: Mostly cloudy with isolated rain/snow showers, with snow mainly falling across the higher terrain. Winds: NW 8-12 mph, High: 45 (39-47) Tonight: Decreasing clouds with a few lingering mountain flurries. Winds: NW 8-12 mph, Low: 32 (27-35) Tuesday: Partly cloudy and breezy. Winds: WNW 10-20 mph, High: 46 (41-49), Low: 31 (25-34) Wednesday: Partly cloudy skies. Highs will be in the middle to upper 40s with lows in the 30s. Thursday: Mostly cloudy with spotty showers possible. Highs will be in the lower to middle 40s with lows in the 20s. Friday: Mostly sunny skies. Highs will be in the lower to middle 40s with lows in the middle to upper 20s. Saturday: Cloudy with rain/snow likely. Highs will be in the upper 30s to lower 40s with lows in the lower to middle 30s. Sunday: Mostly cloudy with spotty rain/snow showers early. Highs will be in the 40s with lows in the upper 20s to lower 30s.

author: News Desk
title: Drought-damage limitation
text:
Aside from this week’s showers in Islamabad-Rawalpindi and Lahore, it has not rained much for about four months. This lack of rain is already having an adverse impact on our agricultural sector and, consequently, our food reserves.
Due to lack of rain, there has also been a shortage of clean water, calling for the implementation of water conservation policies. While the country cannot do much about the lack of rain, we can take steps to mitigate the damage from drought and adapt to increasing climate difficulties.
Muhammad Murtaza Khan
Rawalpindi

author: Heather Waldman
title: Stormy Saturday: Strong winds ahead of downpours and big Sierra snow
text:
Stormy Saturday: Strong winds ahead of downpours and big Sierra snow
The morning will be wet and windy in the Valley and Foothills.
The morning will be wet and windy in the Valley and Foothills.
The morning will be wet and windy in the Valley and Foothills.
This weekend will start off stormy with strong winds, Valley downpours and heavy Sierra snow.
Saturday is a KCRA 3 weather Impact Day with the worst conditions for the Valley expected in the morning.
Here is a breakdown of what to expect with the rain, snow and wind.
Wind
Strong winds will be widespread ahead of sunrise Saturday morning. Much of the Valley will see gusts of 35 to 45 mph between 6 a.m. and 1 p.m. Winds of this strength could scatter or damage any loose items in yards. Homeowners should double check their holiday decorations on Friday afternoon to make sure they are secure.
The Foothills will see a couple of hours of strong winds later in the morning as well, especially south of Highway 50.
Wind gusts over the Sierra crest could top 60 mph. This will affect operations at ski resorts.
Wind will gradually weaken Saturday afternoon into the evening.
Snow
Snow showers will lead to more chain controls during the day on Friday. Travel over the summits will be easiest during the afternoon.
The snow level will start around 5,000 feet and then rise to 6,000 feet. Donner Summit will pick up three to six inches of snow during the day on Friday.
Saturday will not be a good day for travel in the mountains.
A more intense round of snow is in the forecast. Steady snow will fall from early morning through the evening and it will accumulate quickly at times. Snowfall combined with gusty winds will significantly reduce visibility and make travel dangerous.
Saturday's snow totals could reach 12 to 18 inches at Donner Summit. Tahoe area ski resorts could see as much as three feet of new snow between Friday and Saturday.
Sunday will be a clear day with lighter winds.
Rain
It will not rain all day Saturday, but a couple of bands of wet weather could bring some big downpours. One round will come through around 4 a.m. Saturday. A second round is possible between 8 a.m. and 10 a.m.
These bands of rain could trigger lightning and thunder as they roll into the Foothills later in the morning.
The afternoon will be mainly dry in the Valley, but isolated downpours and thunderstorms are still possible until sunset.
Rainfall between Thursday and Saturday will help bring most Northern California locations close to their respective average amounts for this point in December.

author: @billyheyen
title: Lakers' Bronny James has amusing stat in common with Ben Simmons | Sporting News
text:
Bronny James and Ben Simmons have something in common.
For fans of LeBron James and the Los Angeles Lakers, don't worry — that shouldn't be the case for long.
But for a couple nights, the corners of NBA Twitter have laughed at the fact that Bronny and the mostly disappointing Simmons have one statistic in common.
In Simmons' NBA career, he has made five 3-pointers. In Bronny's NBA career, he has made five 3-pointers.
MORE: Is LeBron playing tonight?
Bronny edges Simmons in percentage, having shot 5-for-22 (22.7) compared to Simmons' 5-for-36 (13.9).
Of course, Bronny should soon surge past Simmons, considering it has taken Bronny 20 NBA games to reach that mark while Simmons' five 3-pointers have come in 373 games.
Simmons actually hasn't even attempted a 3-pointer in either of the last two seasons.
Bronny is a solid enough long-range shooter in the G League, making 2.9 3-pointers per night on 36 percent shooting.
And no, this stat doesn't really have any bearing on anything. But it's never a bad time to find commonalities between wildly different NBA players who both have their own social media lovers and haters.

76ers' Quentin Grimes joins two future Hall of Famers on exclusive list Celtics' surprise sharpshooter hits nearly impossible statistical feat Warriors get bad Steph Curry news Kevin Durant's frustrations are mounting LaVar Ball shares on-brand first thoughts since leg amputation

author: archyde
title: Boeing 737 MAX Trouble: Loose Screw and Missing Nut- Worldwide Inspection Required
text:
2023-12-28 21:15:49
Published28. December 2023, 10:15 p.m
Seattle, USA: Boeing in trouble again because of a loose screw on a 737 MAX
Boeing is in trouble again with its 737 MAX: After an airline discovered a missing nut, all aircraft of the type are now to be inspected.
1 / 4
An airline discovered a missing nut on a bolt. A loose screw was also discovered on a 737 MAX that had not yet been delivered.
imago images/ZUMA Wire
Now all machines worldwide are to be checked.
REUTERS
The problem concerns a tie rod used to control rudder movements.
REUTERS
That’s what it’s about
-
An airline discovered a missing nut on a control rod on a Boeing 737 MAX.
-
The US aviation safety authority has now asked all airlines to check the relevant component.
-
The aircraft manufacturer’s shares fell after the news.
The US aircraft manufacturer Boeing cannot relax – this time it is about a bolt in the rudder control system of the 737 MAX model. The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) urged operators of newer single-aisle aircraft in a statement Thursday to inspect certain control rods used to control rudder movements for loss of parts. The agency called in a statement to “closely monitor targeted inspections of Boeing 737 MAX aircraft for the possibility of a loose screw in the rudder control system.”
«The problem identified with a particular aircraft has been resolved. As a matter of caution, we recommend that operators inspect their 737 MAX aircraft and inform us of the results,” a spokesman for aircraft manufacturer Boeing said in a statement. This inspection consists of opening an access hatch and visually checking that everything is compliant. This process is expected to take approximately two hours per aircraft.
An international airline had previously noticed a missing nut on a bolt during routine maintenance. Boeing also subsequently discovered a nut on a 737 MAX that had not yet been delivered that was not tightened “according to regulations”.
Boeing hit financially
Investors reacted disappointedly to the news. The Boeing price fell by almost one percent at the end of the Dow. A week ago, stock market experts were still confident that, according to a media report, Boeing was allowed to deliver medium-haul jets from the 737 MAX series to China again after a year-long stop.
After two aircraft disasters in October 2018 and March 2019 that killed 346 people, the 737 MAX was grounded worldwide for months. More recently, the aircraft manufacturer has had to slow its deliveries due to problems with the fuselage, particularly the aircraft’s rear watertight bulkhead. Boeing has delivered a total of more than 1,370 copies of the 737 MAX, and the order book currently includes more than 4,000 aircraft.
In Switzerland, no airline has this type of aircraft in its fleet, as a look at the websites shows. One
List of Boeing shows which airlines rely on the type.
